name: @fusionauth/typescript-client
description: A typescript implementation of the FusionAuth client.

scripts.build-browser: mkdir -p dist && npx browserify index.ts --standalone FusionAuth --debug -p [ tsify --target=es5 ] -o dist/fusionauth-typescript-client.js
scripts.build-browser-min: mkdir -p dist && npx browserify index.ts --standalone FusionAuth --debug -p [ tsify --target=es5 ] -t uglifyify | npx uglifyjs --source-map base -o dist/fusionauth-typescript-client.min.js
scripts.pretest: npx tsc && mkdir -p dist && npx browserify test/FusionAuthClientTest.ts --debug -t envify -p [ tsify --target=es5 ] -t uglifyify | npx uglifyjs --source-map base -o dist/fusionauth-typescript-client-test.min.js

author: Tyler Scott
